node.title: Sydney Opera House illuminates life of acting legend David Gulpilil in posthumous tribute
node.description: One of Australia’s greatest ever actors, David Gulpilil, has lit up the sails of the Sydney Opera House as the nation continues to pay tribute to the late Northern Territory movie star’s life and films.
node.content:
["One of Australia's greatest actors has illuminated what may be his grandest ever screen \u2014\u00a0the eastern Bennelong sails of the Sydney Opera House.", "WARNING: Aboriginal and Torres Strait Islander readers are advised this article contains images of a person who has died.", "The late actor's family has granted permission to use his image.", "A week since the death of David Gulpilil, whose family have now permitted the usage of his famous surname, the nation continues to pay tribute to the Northern Territory movie star's life and films.", "The Rabbit Proof Fence, Crocodile Dundee, Australia and Storm Boy actor \u2014\u00a0a Yolngu man of the Mandhalpuyngu clan \u2014\u00a0passed away last week in regional South Australia after a lengthy battle with lung cancer.", "Projections of Gulpilil's life in film, from his first role in the outback classic Walkabout to his last, as an ailing cancer patient in the documentary I Am Gulpilil, have lit up the sails of the Sydney landmark as the local film industry prepares to bestow him with their highest accolade.", "", "
David Gulpilil will be honoured with the 2021 AACTA Longford Lyell Award.(Supplied: Don Arnold / AACTA)
", "The late actor will be honoured with the Longford Lyell Award at Wednesday night's AACTA Awards \u2014\u00a0the Australian film industry's equivalent to the Oscars \u2014\u00a0joining the illustrious ranks of past recipients Cate Blanchett, Jackie Weaver and his Crocodile Dundee co-star, Paul Hogan.", "\"David carried the legacy of his people into all his performances creating an authenticity that had never been seen widely before, and will never be forgotten,\" AACTA chief executive Damian Trewhella said.", "\"By redefining how the world sees Indigenous Australians, he paved the way for the next generation to reject cultural stereotypes and express their own truths.", "\"All Australia owe him a debt.\"", "", "
With the award Gulpilil joins past recipients Cate Blanchett, Jackie Weaver and Paul Hogan.(Supplied: Don Arnold / AACTA)
", "His lifetime achievement award will be introduced at the ceremony by Yolngu\u00a0rapper Baker Boy.", "The Sydney Opera House tribute will be projected onto the sails again for the occasion, as his accolade is posthumously presented.", "
Fellow Yolngu\u00a0actor to pay tribute
", "Gulpilil's son by lore and Yothu Yindi musician Witiyana Marika\u00a0will join the celebrations to his renowned relative at the AACTA Awards.", "Mr Marika is also an actor, who played a key role in the gritty 2020 NT film High Ground \u2014 a role originally cast for Gulpilil, who'd been forced to pull out of the shoot due to his cancer diagnosis.", "\"I'll be singin' his name, I'll be singin' his estate \u2026\u00a0the place he comes from, the land, the water,\" the senior Rirratji\u014bu clan elder said.", "\"Healing the spirit. The powerful spirit of the land, and his name.\"", "Mr Marika said the industry would be offering their respects to the \"boy who came out from the Marwuyu bush and became a big shining star\".", "\"He was the first shining light for me, and for everyone else who believed in him, and who saw him,\" he said.", "\"And he made a big change, you know? He was a Yolngu\u00a0Mandhalpuyngu role model.\"", "
State funeral plans still unknown
", "The NT government says any plans for the actor to receive a state funeral remain up in the air.", "\"We remain in discussions with the family around their wishes for Mr Dalaithngu's [Gulpilil's] funeral,\" an NT government spokesman said.", "\"This will take time. We will provide an update as soon as we have one.\""]
